post:
SupremeBytes, LLC would like to announce its new VPS product line in Los Angeles, USA with a promo for the LowEnd Talk community. We now offer KVM vps services in the Los Angeles location! You will be able to manage your own rDNS inside your SolusVM management interface.

SupremeBytes, LLC is BBB Accredited!

**Use promocode "los-angeles" for 35% off recurring.**

**KVM-512**
KVM
512 Mb ram
10 Gb Disk Space
100Gb Network Transfer
1 IPv4
20 IPv6 (at request)
$7.00 Monthly  - Order: https://secure.supremebytes.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=107

**OVZ-512**
OpenVZ
512Mb ram
1Gb Burst ram
50Gb Disk Space
500Gb Network Transfer
1 IPv4
20 IPv6 (at request)
$7.00 Monthly - Order: https://secure.supremebytes.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=92


**Use promocode "los-angeles" for 35% off recurring.**

KVM http://www.supremebytes.com/business-virtual-servers.php

We also have OpenVZ services in France, Los Angeles and New Jersey of the USA

Linux operating systems: Ubuntu 12.04, Centos5/6, Arch Linux, Suse 12.1, Debian, Fedora
(32/64 bit on all choices)
Control Panel: KVM with SolusVM
